simplified: 刀不磨要生锈，人不学要落后

pronunciation.pinyin: dāo bù mó yào shēng xiù , rén bù xué yào luò hòu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: dao1 bu4 mo2 yao4 sheng1 xiu4 , ren2 bu4 xue2 yao4 luo4 hou4

details.simplified: 刀不磨要生锈，人不学要落后
details.traditional: 刀不磨要生銹，人不學要落後

meanings.value: a blade will get rusty if it is not sharpened; a man will fall behind if he doesn't study
